body:
Ok so as some of you can tell, I haven't been on lately. This is because my Minecraft hasn't been opening for some reason but today I got it fixed! (surprisingly)...... sadly the only issue is that whenever I try to login to the server using Hypixel's Skull Client (the only client i feel safe to use because I got banned of servers for having Labymod and I don't use 5zig because it doesn't allow you to use togglesprint), it closes my game and says "It looks like you are using an unsupported modified version of the game....the game crashed while tesselating block model" and so this is what I need to know:


- Is this happening for any of you?
- If not, what version are you using and are you using something like Forge or Labymod?
- any suggestions to clients for 1.8? (not asking for hacked clients)
- Clients I will not use: Labymod because of it not being allowed on some servers, 5zig because it does not allow you to use toggle sprint, Forge because it is too laggy for me.

If you want to help out ya boy, it'd be nice! I will give previews to my pack to those who give any suggestions that help me out :)
